title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Streamline AI model development lifecycle with Amazon SageMaker AI (AIM364)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon SageMaker AI 简化 AI 模型开发生命周期 (AIM364)
abstract: Southwest Airlines® operates one of the world’s most awarded airlines, offering one-of-a-kind value and hospitality at 117 airports in 11 countries, with up to 4,000+ flights daily. This massive operation is powered by technology, from selling tickets to aircraft maintenance to paying employees. What if Southwest’s 2,000+ developers could spend more time on innovative problem-solving? Join Grant Morris, Managing Director, Technology at Southwest Airlines, alongside leaders from GitLab and AWS, to discover the power of GitLab Duo and Amazon Q Developer. Hear how Southwest is enhancing developer productivity through AI-powered DevSecOps and pioneering the next frontier of agentic AI automation. This presentation is brought to you by GitLab, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 西南航空公司®运营着世界上最受赞誉的航空公司之一，在11个国家的117个机场提供独一无二的价值和服务，每日航班多达4,000多架次。这一庞大的运营由技术驱动，从售票到飞机维护再到员工薪酬发放。如果西南航空的2,000多名开发人员能够将更多时间用于创新性问题解决，会怎样？请加入西南航空技术总监Grant Morris，以及来自GitLab和AWS的领导者，探索GitLab Duo和Amazon Q Developer的强大功能。了解西南航空如何通过AI驱动的DevSecOps提升开发人员生产力，并开创代理式AI自动化的下一个前沿领域。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴GitLab呈现。
